name: Big Tony
description:
Arrow keys to move:
'left arrow' = Left
'right arrow' = Right
'up arrow' = Jump

'down arrow' = fall thru platform

'Spacebar' = Action Button (use when prompted)

'r' = Restart Game

Big Tony is a stereotypical type of guy and he enjoys his Mozza (Pizza). The more he eats, the faster he goes!

  • Collect the Pizza slices to get to the Mozza goals and extend your time
  • Get that MOzza before time runs out
  • 700 Mozzas to win
